scripts.wasm:build: cd wasm-image-validator && wasm-pack build --target web --out-dir pkg && cd .. && node -e "const fs=require('fs'),path=require('path');const src=path.join('wasm-image-validator','pkg');const dest=path.join('app','client','lib','wasm');fs.mkdirSync(dest,{recursive:true});for(const f of fs.readdirSync(src)){fs.copyFileSync(path.join(src,f),path.join(dest,f));}"
scripts.wasm:dev: cd wasm-image-validator && wasm-pack build --target web --out-dir pkg --dev && cd .. && node -e "const fs=require('fs'),path=require('path');const src=path.join('wasm-image-validator','pkg');const dest=path.join('app','client','lib','wasm');fs.mkdirSync(dest,{recursive:true});for(const f of fs.readdirSync(src)){fs.copyFileSync(path.join(src,f),path.join(dest,f));}"
scripts.deploy:client: npm run predeploy && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=12288 NEXT_CPU_COUNT=1 firebase deploy --only hosting:kyoto-brick
scripts.deploy:admin: npm run predeploy && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=12288 NEXT_CPU_COUNT=1 firebase deploy --only hosting:admin-kyoto-brick
scripts.deploy:all: npm run predeploy && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=12288 NEXT_CPU_COUNT=1 firebase deploy --only hosting
